title: Cannot move app icons from search results to home screen
content:
When search for an app from home screen I can see what apps are found from those already installed. I cannot however add a shortcuts for those apps to home screen.
When I tap and hold - home screen appears, but the icon freezes and stays frozen even when finger is released. Turn off/on screen (power button) unfreezes home screen, but icon is not placed.
I can only add shortcuts from the app drawer if I select app manually (not from search).
Tried to clear Launcher data (lost all personalisation of icons and placement in home screen). Didn't help at all.

I'm on build RP1A.201105.002
